Philpott Law Will Fight For You

If you have been accused of a criminal offense in Daytona Beach or neighboring Volusia County area such as DeLand, Deltona, or Orange City, we encourage you to contact the experienced and passionate Criminal Defense Attorneys at Philpott Law.

We represent clients facing criminal charges including, but not limited to:

  • Domestic Violence
  • Drug Possession
  • Weapons Offenses
  • Sex Crimes, and more

Since being convicted of criminal charges can carry long sentences and/or huge fines, it's imperative that you have someone on your side who will aggressively fight the case on your behalf, and with your best interest in mind.

Experienced Criminal Defense Representation

Many people simply do not realize all of the rights they are entitled to under the law. As a result, many people unwittingly waive their legal rights simply because they did not first seek the advice of an experienced Criminal Defense Attorney like Danny Philpott.

Our team of attorneys at Philpott Law exercise due diligence and take care to ensure that you are presumed innocent until proven guilty.

If you or someone you know has been charged with a crime and would like to speak with a Criminal Defense Attorney in the Daytona Beach area, contact us immediately for a free consultation at (386) 873-2884.
